event.title: pressure transmitter
event.description:
Pressure transmitter is created by TM’s own difficulty sensor core as sensor private element. Pressure transmitter might be transferred liquid or gas pressure in the standard electrical output sign: 4~20mA, 0~10V etc.

TM’s most of sensor products strictly proceed by high-low temperature calibrated as well as endurance test with challenging structure. By 17 years’ ongoing study, research and development.

TM shares a reliable pressure transducer offerings to some very famous customer including Carrier, LG and SANY Party etc.

Applications of difficulty transmitter



·Construction machinery

·Building devices

·Mining machinery

·Pneumatic process





Introduction of pressure transmitter

P22J difficulty transmitter use film sputtering technological innovation as sensor sensitive nick. Pressure transmitter can be transferred liquid or gas pressure in to the various standard analog output signal 4~20mA, 0~5VDC, 0~10VDC, 0. 5~4. 5VDC. Transmitter just proceed by high-low heat calibrated and endurance experiment with tough structure. It truly is proved that P22 product useful under severe environment, P22 product has shared the best performance and service to a few very famous customer for example Zoomlion, XCMG and SANY Party etc. The product is traditional for construction machinery, building machinery, Mining machinery along with pneumatic system.



Special features of pressure transmitter


·Wide pressure range up to 100 Mpa, excellent impression resistance

·Reliable and firm under extreme environment

·Standard different analog output 4~20mA, 0~5VDC, 0~10VDC, 0. 5~4. 5VDC

·Thin Film Sputtering chip.
